selrach.bnetbuilder.data
Class ElementMetadata

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.data.ElementMetadata

public class ElementMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

This is the metadata for each element in a data source. An element is a potential mapping to a variable within the model

Author:
Charles Robertson

moveRangeUpperBoundary

public void moveRangeUpperBoundary(int whichRange,
                                   double newBoundaryValue)
Moves the upper boundary of a range to the new value, if other, supposedly higher boundaries are included in that range, they get smashed up to the top

Parameters:
whichRange - The range to map the boundary to
newBoundaryValue - The new boundary value

setupDefaultRanges

public void setupDefaultRanges(java.util.List<java.lang.String> modelStates)

getRangeStates

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRangeStates()
Gets the list of range states in the metadata, there should be one more state than boundary, the upper and lower values have the max double and min double values respectively as their boundaries
